thread.title: Can children of today master old technology?
thread.title_full: Can children of today master old technology?

title: Can children of today master old technology?
text: 'How did people live like this?' Children are clueless when presented with gadgets of the past - including a Walkman, Gameboy and a retro phone Sydney school kids were presented with a Walkman, Gameboy and an old phone They were asked to try and use the items and describe them They were all baffled by the Walkman, with one saying it was like a 'music app' Another said she had seen all of the items before at a museum They were then asked whether they would prefer the items of their iPhone
